DOC.brief_summary: This study objective is to evaluate the change in mitochondrial uncoupling protein 2 (UCP2) mRNA expression as function of thyroid activity (TSH, T3 and Free T4).
DOC.brief_title: Changes in Metabolic Status in Patients With Total Thyroidectomy
DOC.detailed_description: Blood will be drown before thyroidectomy, 2 weeks after the operation and 3-4 month after the operation.
DOC.criteria: Patients who were diagnosed with thyroid carcinoma and are going to have total thyroidectomy. Patients with unbalanced thyroid hormones. Aged 1865 years at the time of screening. Provision of written informed consent. Patients with Diabetes. Patients with any other chronic inflammatory diseases. Steroid treatment.
